post:
Hi guys!

We have the following deals available. These will end on March 27th. Some deals will end early, please keep an eye on this thread before placing an order. Once a deal is gone, it is gone. It is first come first serve.

<pre>
KVM Storage 1500
1 GB RAM
1.5 TB RAID-50 disk
4 TB bandwidth
$18 per quarter
(Available in Los Angeles)
</pre>

<pre>
KVM Storage 750
1 GB RAM
750 GB RAID-50 disk
2 TB bandwidth
$35 per year
(Available in Los Angeles)
</pre>

<pre>
KVM storage 250
512 MB RAM
250 GB RAID-50 disk
1 TB bandwidth
$17 per year
(Available in Los Angeles and Stockholm in very limited quantities - and will likely be sold out in 24 hours)
</pre>

<pre>
NVMe 0.5 GB
1x 2.8 GHz CPU core (12.5% dedicated)
0.5 GB RAM (+ 256 MB free RAM)
5 GB NVMe SSD (RAID-10)
1 TB bandwidth
$15 per year
(Available in Los Angeles, Stockholm and Amsterdam)
</pre>

<pre>
NVMe 1 GB
1x 2.8 GHz CPU core (25% dedicated)
1 GB RAM (+ 512 MB free RAM)
10 GB NVMe SSD (RAID-10)
2 TB bandwidth
$30 per year
(Available in Los Angeles, Stockholm and Amsterdam)
</pre>

<pre>
NVMe 2 GB
1x 2.8 GHz CPU core (50% dedicated)
2 GB RAM (+ 1 GB free RAM)
20 GB NVMe SSD (RAID-10)
2 TB bandwidth
$15 per quarter
(Available in Los Angeles, Stockholm and Amsterdam)
</pre>

For any larger NVMe plans, you get 50% more RAM, if paying at least quarterly.

To order, please login to manage.hosthatch.com, deposit the appropriate amount of funds by going to the billing page and open a ticket mentioning the promotion/location so we can setup the server for you. Please do not open an emergency ticket for this.
